name: Kean University
campus: Metropolitan, urban (small city, 13 miles from Manhattan)., 121.5 acres (Main Campus), 35.4 (East Campus), 28.5 (Liberty Hall Campus)
former_names: Kean College of New Jersey, Newark State College, New Jersey State Teachers College, New Jersey State Normal School, Newark Normal School
affiliations: Middle States Association of Colleges and Schools, New Jersey Athletic Conference,   National Association of Schools of Theatre
